mapper.sql: id as id , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , status as status , name as name , tblName as tblName , description as description

INSERT INTO mubs_model ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, tblName, description ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{name}, #{tblName}, #{description} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

creator = #{creator},

lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
name = #{name},
tblName = #{tblName},
